casebody.data:
Mary Jane KRUGH, in Her Individual Capacity and as Trustee of the Mary Jane Krugh Trust Agreement Dated June 16, 1992, as Subsequently Amended and Restated, et al., Respondents,
v.
John Adam KRUGH, IV, Appellant. WD 81929 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: June 18, 2019 John Roe, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Colin Stoner, Kansas City, MO, Co-Counsel for Appellant. Joseph Bant, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Robert Tormohlen, Kansas City, MO, Co-Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Three: Thomas H. Newton, Presiding Judge, Anthony Rex Gabbert, and Edward R. Ardini, Judges

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. John Adam Krugh, IV appeals a Jackson County Circuit Court judgment confirming a partition sale of the property at 5029 Sunset Drive Kansas City, Missouri 64112, allowing reimbursement of attorney fees and costs, and ordering disbursement of the partition sale proceeds. For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
